title: Zabihah: Find and order halal food
description: Zabihah, the ultimate halal food guide, has been completely revamped! Discover over 45,000 halal restaurants and markets worldwide with a sleek, intuitive design. Share your dining experiences, post photos, and rate your favorite spots. Enjoy fast halal food delivery and order certified halal meat and groceries (conning soon). Locate nearby prayer spaces on the go. Enhanced with improved performance, global accessibility, and increased security, Zabihah is your go-to app for a halal lifestyle!
